xwikidoc.creator: xwiki:XWiki.Admin
xwikidoc.author: xwiki:XWiki.Admin
xwikidoc.title: Mail Translations
xwikidoc.content: admin.email=メール ### Missing: admin.email.description=Configure mail sending parameters and view mail statuses. ### Missing: admin.emailgeneral=Advanced ### Missing: admin.emailgeneral.description=Configure advanced mail parameters, like mail address obfuscation. ### Missing: admin.emailsend=Mail Sending ### Missing: admin.emailsend.description=Configure mail sending parameters. ### Missing: admin.emailstatus=Mail Sending Status ### Missing: admin.emailstatus.description=View the statuses of sent mails and resend mails that resulted in failure. ### Missing: admin.emailstatus.hint=If you can't find the status of a mail then it may be because the property which sent the mail did not specify that mail status should persist. ### Missing: Mail.GeneralMailConfigClass_obfuscate=Obfuscate Email Addresses ### Missing: Mail.GeneralMailConfigClass_obfuscate.hint=This only affects the email addresses stored in object properties of type Email, as long as the default custom displayer for the Email property type is not overwritten. Example: a...@domain.org ### Missing: Mail.SendMailConfigClass_from=Email address to send from ### Missing: Mail.SendMailConfigClass_from.hint=The default email address used to send notification emails from ### Missing: Mail.SendMailConfigClass_bcc=BCC email addresses ### Missing: Mail.SendMailConfigClass_bcc.hint=A default comma-separated list of BCC email addresses to use when sending mail Mail.SendMailConfigClass_host=Eメールサーバー ### Missing: Mail.SendMailConfigClass_host.hint=The SMTP server to send to. Defaults to "localhost" Mail.SendMailConfigClass_port=Eメールサーバーのポート Mail.SendMailConfigClass_port.hint=使用するSMTPサーバーのポート。既定の数値は25です Mail.SendMailConfigClass_username=Eメールサーバーのユーザー名 Mail.SendMailConfigClass_username.hint=SMTPサーバーに接続する際のユーザー名。認証が必要な場合のみ Mail.SendMailConfigClass_password=Eメールサーバーのパスワード Mail.SendMailConfigClass_password.hint=SMTPサーバーに接続する際のパスワード。認証が必要な場合のみ ### Missing: Mail.SendMailConfigClass_properties=Additional Properties ### Missing: Mail.SendMailConfigClass_properties.hint=The list of additional JavaMail properties to use (e.g. "mail.smtp.starttls.enable=true" for TLS) ### Missing: Mail.SendMailConfigClass_sendWaitTime=Send Wait Time ### Missing: Mail.SendMailConfigClass_sendWaitTime.hint=The delay between each mail being sent, in milliseconds (defaults to 8 seconds) ### Missing: Mail.SendMailConfigClass_discardSuccessStatuses=Discard Success Statuses? ### Missing: Mail.SendMailConfigClass_discardSuccessStatuses.hint=No matter whether mail statuses are kept or not for mail that has been sent successfully (defaults to true) Mail.SendMailStatus_livetable.date=日付 Mail.SendMailStatus_livetable.batchId=バッチID Mail.SendMailStatus_livetable.type=種類 Mail.SendMailStatus_livetable.recipients=受信者 Mail.SendMailStatus_livetable.state=状態 Mail.SendMailStatus_livetable.wiki=ウィキ ### Missing: Mail.SendMailStatus_livetable.error=Error ### Missing: Mail.SendMailStatus_livetable.actions=Actions ### Missing: Mail.SendMailStatus_livetable.resend=Resend ### Missing: mailSender.admin.resendSuccess=The mail has been resent successfully ### Missing: mailSender.admin.resendFailure=Failed to resend. Click for more details.
